title: The Fallen: The Fallen 1; The Fallen 2; The Fallen 3
description: The first three volumes in the New York Times bestselling The Fallen series is available as a collectible boxed set. Join the ultimate quest for redemption.The son of a mortal and an angel, Aaron has been chosen to redeem the Fallen. But as war rages between Heaven and Hell, evil powers gain strength at every turn. Aaron must harness the incredible force within him if he’s going to save himself and the girl he loves—let alone the entire world. And Aaron is out to prove that what doesn’t kill you makes you stronger.This collectible boxed set chronicles Aaron’s quest for redemption and includes The Fallen 1 , The Fallen 2 , and The Fallen 3 .
author: Thomas E. Sniegoski
